services.title: Our Services
services.description: Discover our wide range of event planning and coordination services to make your special occasions truly memorable.

servicesList.name: Event Planning
servicesList.description: Comprehensive event planning services tailored to your needs, from concept to execution.
servicesList.shortDescription: Craft your perfect event with the guidance of our experienced planning experts.

servicesList.name: Venue Selection
servicesList.description: We help you find the perfect venue that matches your event's style and size.
servicesList.shortDescription: Discover an ideal location that sets the stage for your unforgettable gathering.

servicesList.name: Decor and Design
servicesList.description: Create a visually stunning atmosphere with our event decor and design expertise.
servicesList.shortDescription: Elevate your event's ambiance to a whole new level of elegance and charm.

servicesList.name: Catering Services
servicesList.description: Delight your guests with delicious catering options, from gourmet meals to finger foods.
servicesList.shortDescription: Savor the exquisite flavors that will leave your guests craving for more.

servicesList.name: Entertainment
servicesList.description: Keep the party going with our entertainment services, including live music and DJs.
servicesList.shortDescription: Entertain your guests with music that will have them dancing all night long.

servicesList.name: Photography and Videography
servicesList.description: Capture every moment with our professional photography and videography services.
servicesList.shortDescription: Preserve cherished memories with stunning photographs and videos.

servicesList.name: Event Coordination
servicesList.description: Relax and enjoy your event while we handle all the logistics and coordination.
servicesList.shortDescription: Experience stress-free event planning and enjoy every moment.

servicesList.name: Wedding Planning
servicesList.description: Let us help you create the wedding of your dreams with our dedicated wedding planning services.
servicesList.shortDescription: Craft your dream wedding with the guidance of our dedicated team.

servicesList.name: Birthday Celebrations
servicesList.description: Make your birthday unforgettable with our specialized birthday celebration planning.
servicesList.shortDescription: Celebrate your special day in style and create lasting memories.

servicesList.name: Custom Services
servicesList.description: Tailor our services to meet your unique event needs, including anniversaries, corporate events, and more.
servicesList.shortDescription: Customize your event and make it truly one-of-a-kind.
